about_the_game:
Something is wrong in the town of “Frieden.” The stories about the events in the town could be worth gold. If the rumors about the town's priest are true, you are about to step into something big. That's why you should not miss the priest's sermons and pay close attention to what he says. Be careful while doing so because if you can see him, he can also see you.

The more you learn about what is happening in this gloomy town, the more you might feel the colors around you fading and your good feelings slipping away. You should listen carefully to the workers who have been employed in this town for generations and their cruel employers. You were sent here not to solve the mystery but to report on it.

Be careful of those who observe you while you observe all these events. The people of this town do not seem to get along well with newcomers. Even trains take more than two weeks to reach here. So, you will stay here for a long time, and the time will feel even longer the more you remain here.

Every move you make will determine your fate. Reaching your home safely is in your hands. As you wander the streets of this terrifying town, watch carefully and listen closely. Be prepared for events that might freeze your blood.

Developer's Note: "Puke," the first game from our Skyfect team, was entirely created by a volunteer team. The designs, sounds, and materials you will see in our game were created and developed by members of our team. Our game consists of 4 stages, with the first 3 stages in Early Access, and they will continue to be developed.

That's why you should not miss the priest's sermons and pay close attention to what he says. Be careful while doing so because if you can see him, he can also see you.

The more you learn about what is happening in this gloomy town, the more you might feel the colors around you fading and your good feelings slipping away. You should listen carefully to the workers who have been employed in this town for generations and their cruel employers. You were sent here not to solve the mystery but to report on it.

Be careful of those who observe you while you observe all these events. The people of this town do not seem to get along well with newcomers. Even trains take more than two weeks to reach here. So, you will stay here for a long time, and the time will feel even longer the more you remain here.

Every move you make will determine your fate. Reaching your home safely is in your hands. As you wander the streets of this terrifying town, watch carefully and listen closely. Be prepared for events that might freeze your blood.

name: Puke

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 4GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: As a journalist, it is your duty to investigate the mysterious, remote town of “Frieden.” You must observe and document the events happening in the town. Only in this way can you uncover the town's mysteries.
supported_languages:
Turkish*, English
*languages with full audio support
